content: I don't have access to real-time data or personal opinions, but typically, skiing and snowboarding are some of the most popular winter activities in banff national park. the three ski resorts in the area, banff mount norquay, sunshine village, and lake louise ski resort, offer a wide range of slopes for all skill levels and a breathtaking alpine scenery that attracts many visitors from around the world. however, other activities such as snowshoeing and hot springs are also very popular among tourists.
